edu.umass.cs.gigapaxos

Class PaxosClientAsync

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umass.cs.gigapaxos.PaxosClientAsync
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NoopPaxosAppClient

    public class PaxosClientAsync
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    arun This class is meant to only send and receive RequestPacket requests. To use other app-specific request types, use ReconfigurableAppClientAsync.
